text: Bogdan Józef Wojtuś Bogdan Wojtuś on catholic-hierarchy.org (4 July 1937 – 20 October 2020) was a Polish Roman Catholic prelate. He was an auxiliary bishop of the archdiocese of Gniezno from 1988 until 2012. He was born in Łąsko Wielki, Poland.Bishop Bogdan Wojtuś is retiring. Pope John Paul II appointed him Titular Bishop of Vassinassa on November 17, 1993, and Auxiliary Bishop of Gniezno. On September 15, 2012, Pope Benedict XVI accepted his resignation request made for reasons of age. Pope accepted the resignation of Bishop Bogdana Wojtusia Wojtuś died on 20 October 2020 from COVID-19 in Poznań, Poland at the age of 83.Zmarł bp Bogdan Wojtuś ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Poland Category:Polish Roman Catholic bishops Category:2020 deaths
title: Bogdan Józef Wojtuś
